bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) for Exchanging Automatic Test Information Via XML: Exchanging Test Station Information
IEEE Draft Standard for Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) for Exchanging Automatic Test Information Via XML: Exchanging Test Station Information
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1671.6/D5, Feb 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document spefifies an exchange format, utilizing XML., for identifying all of the hardware, software, and documentation associated with a test station. This test station may be used as a component of a test program set TPS) to test and diagnose a unit under test 9UUT)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
